"We dont want aim to be the deciding factor in matches"-  Actual CSGO dev quote  ~2018 

Global Offensive has taken Counter Strike in an entirely different direction from its predecessors.  They have chosen to focus on team work and strategy over raw reaction speed and mechanics. Shooting mechanics have been changed from prior tittles to greatly benefit and simple spraying, peaking and moving while shooting. They have removed the majority of wall bangs from the game incentivizing random peaking instead of holding angles. The maps have been greatly altered to have substantially more corners and hiding holes greatly increasing the chance of someone shooting you in the back as you take site.  

Its up to you what you prefer, strategy or mechanics.  I personally think the mechanics of CSGO are the absolute worst they've ever been and its one of the worst FPS games ever made.

El juego de por si es muy bueno, graficamente y jugabilidad le doy un 10/10, aunque desde que lo pusieron gratis hay varios hackers en las partidas, pero afortunadamente mepa que mejoraron el anti cheats por que todos estos (hackers) desaparecieron. Eso si, si vas a jugar competitivo preparate por que esta lleno de vividos, aun recuerdo cuando compre este juego a 160 Pesos y luego salio gratis xD

Final: 10/10 (Si te gustan mucho los Shooter, jugalo por que es una joyita)
